title: MC-Refine: Enhanced Cross-modal 3-D Object Detection via Multi-stage Cross-scale Fusion and Box Refinement
details: W Xu, J Hu, Y Tang, J Chen, N Chen, Z Wang - IEEE Sensors Journal, 2024
abstract: End-to-end DETR-based cross-modal fusion in 3-D object detection has achieved promising performance in many benchmarks. However, these methods either implement cross-modal fusion in a single stage using coarse voxel features, over …
